body_html:
If you go to the generic linux download (Not for PowerX), which should be the 3rd one down for CUda 9.0, the tar.gz file has everything you need. The instructions are right there towards the middle of the webpage to extract it and copy the files to the correct location. Do make sure your LD_LIBRARY_PATH path is set as stated by @shivank01 for libcudnn.so.7.
https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/cudnn-install/index.html

body:
If you go to the generic linux download (Not for PowerX), which should be the 3rd one down for CUda 9.0, the tar.gz file has everything you need. The instructions are right there towards the middle of the webpage to extract it and copy the files to the correct location. Do make sure your  `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` path is set as stated by @shivank01 for libcudnn.so.7.
https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/cudnn-install/index.html
